Articles.Content: Hey guys, my MechJeb is acting strangely and I was wondering if someone could help me. Whenever I use it to get into a transfer orbit, it juts puts the ship at a heading this completely off from what it should be. I tried reinstalling it, but it didn't help. Does anyone know how to fix this?
I know how, but my brother also plays and he can't.. Even though he's like a genius... He usually uses MechJeb a lot...

Hey guys, my MechJeb is acting strangely and I was wondering if someone could help me. Whenever I use it to get into a transfer orbit, it juts puts the ship at a heading this completely off from what it should be. I tried reinstalling it, but it didn't help. Does anyone know how to fix this?

You should try asking this in the MechJeb thread. There are more people looking to help others in the add-on forum.
